title: Fort Frederica National Monument: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets       Pets are allowed at Fort Frederica within the following guidelines:  Pets must be leashed or in a pet stroller Owners must carry with them bags to immediately remove any pet deposits Pets are not allowed in any of the park buildings, including pets in strollers Pets are not allowed on or in any of the ruins or historic structures
